name: usgrfs
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, cusgr), wf1(c1, cdm(c1), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2))))

comment: The edge function of a simple graph is a one-to-one function into unordered pairs of vertices. Simplified version of ~ usgrf . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 13-Aug-2017.) (Revised by AV, 13-Oct-2020.)
